scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rimraf out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to master" && gh-pages -d out && git checkout master -f && git pull && git merge origin/gh-pages --allow-unrelated-histories -m "Deploy Next.js to master" && git push && git checkout develop -f
